THE RED FILE Weekly Blotter

Thanks for your interest in our FREE weekly email subscription!

By subscribing today, you'll instantly recieve your copy of this exciting murder mystery novella, as well as get a weekly email with:

  • links to newly posted short stories & MURDERWIKI articles available online
  • download links for all longer short stories that are only readible via download
  • one free novella, normally selling for between $0.99 and $2.99 on this site … one free each week when you sign up now!
  • a list of newly release, and soon-to-be-released novels
  • a weekly discount code you can use on any or all products on the site

Please fill in the form below to active your subscription and recieve your copy of THE CAMPAIGN FOR VENGEANCE, which sells on this site for $1.49
